title: First 5 Chapters - Volume 2
description: Genre: Contemporary Romance Drama - This ebook will give you the opportunity to discover & read the first 5 chapters from 6 talented Authors. On behalf of all the 6 Authors featured, I hope you enjoy the read. Your reviews and feedback are warmly welcomed and appreciated.Authors:Book 1 - Emerald Barnes – Piercing Through The DarknessBook 2 - Belinda G. Buchanan – After All Is Said And DoneBook 3 - Lorhainne Eckhart – The Forgotten ChildBook 4 - Katheryn Lane – The Royal SheikhBook 5 - Tarek Refaat - RupturedBook 6 - Collette Scott – If We Dare to Dream
author: Belinda G. Buchanan
